title: Irelia Login Screen Music
body:
I love it. Really I LOVE it.

Are you going to upload it to soundcloud?

Thx for the masterpiece
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body: Thanks, glad you're enjoying it! Here's the soundcloud link: [Irelia, the Blade Dancer](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/irelia-the-blade-dancer)
Am I the only one who will get 3-4 letters through my password, then start spacing out and listening to the music?
You are not alone. Thanks Scherzo, what a song, man...
